About Commonwealth Manor
Can't beat the value of these apartments! High ceilings and everything you need while still being budget friendly. In a convenient area, on the border of Allston and Brookline. Close to the Harvard Ave green line stop with great restaurants, cafes and bars nearby. Star Market and Whole foods very close. No pets, no undergrads, no parking.

Move-in fees: first, last, broker fee and $150 key deposit.
Commonwealth Manor is an apartment community located in Suffolk County and the 02134 ZIP Code.
